negative-increment.js

  • opal/stdlib/nodejs/node_modules/glob/node_modules/minimatch/node_modules/brace-expansion/test/negative-increment.js
  • Last modified: 2015-08-19 03:18:33 +0200

var test = require('tape'); var expand = require('..');

test('negative increment', function(t) {

t.deepEqual(expand('{3..1}'), ['3', '2', '1']);
t.deepEqual(expand('{10..8}'), ['10', '9', '8']);
t.deepEqual(expand('{10..08}'), ['10', '09', '08']);
t.deepEqual(expand('{c..a}'), ['c', 'b', 'a']);

t.deepEqual(expand('{4..0..2}'), ['4', '2', '0']);
t.deepEqual(expand('{4..0..-2}'), ['4', '2', '0']);
t.deepEqual(expand('{e..a..2}'), ['e', 'c', 'a']);

t.end();

});
